interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  60  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Normal Office Visit " Seen " Couple's Discount (Sea of Diamonds) " from Ami Arakawa
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first Saturday morning on or after Day 60.

progression.synopsis: Sensei wakes up and walks into the living room, immediately "zoning out" and entering Ami 's room to look for her. Meanwhile, Ami's out on a day trip with Rin and Molly, hoping to distract herself before later today . Sensei continues to fall into his delusions, until Ami finally arrives home and finds him in the middle of his breakdown. She promptly sends him back to bed.
trivia: This event, added in the Chapter 1 Revamp, introduces the motif of birds and, specifically, the Marsh Warbler much earlier.

In the background of this event, the song 'warblewarblewarble' plays on loop. Overlaid on the music is a series of text-to-speech messages. They are, in order: "This is only the beginning. The days that have yet to come will wash over you, like a partially detached showerhead, spewing the sea out of itself in an effort to make you clean. But you will never be clean. There are simply some things that become soiled beyond recognition. This is only the beginning. Greetings, you who are highly favored. The world is your clam's tongue. And you will change those who need it most. You must. This is only the beginning. And I will watch you every step of the way." "Himawari-hatake, sore wa anata ni hanashikakemasu. Kiite kudasai. Semi no nakigoe, kaze ga nakimasu. Makasete, watashi ga anata wo tasukemasu. Anata no me ga daisuki. Anata no me ga daisuki. Anata no me ga daisuki. Anata no me ga daisuki. Anata no me ga daisuki. Anata no me ga daisuki." "The sunflower field: it speaks to you. Listen: the cries of cicadas, the wind sings them. Leave it to me, I'll save you. I love your eyes. I love your eyes. I love your eyes. I love your eyes. I love your eyes. I love your eyes."

And you will change those who need it most. You must. This is only the beginning. And I will watch you every step of the way."

Anata no me ga daisuki. Anata no me ga daisuki. Anata no me ga daisuki. Anata no me ga daisuki." "The sunflower field: it speaks to you. Listen: the cries of cicadas, the wind sings them. Leave it to me, I'll save you. I love your eyes. I love your eyes. I love your eyes. I love your eyes. I love your eyes. I love your eyes."

The fast moving picture called warble1 in the event has a message in hexadecimal. It is, "pray tell what brings you here so early in the morning. this was meant to be glossed over much like the eyes of a dying cat. why glance behind the curtains at all if you are the one who knits them to keep away the shadows. you are the one who fills the clouds with rain. you are the one who bathes in their piss. go jerk off or something."

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.24.
